bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Distributions in America: Papyri and Ethics.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Explores logistical and ethical ramifications of the distribution to institutions in the United States of Oxyrhynchus and other Egypt Exploration Fund papyri during the period 1900 to 1922. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: William A. Johnson, The Oxyrhynchus Distributions in America: Papyri and Ethics.

Explores logistical and ethical ramifications of the distribution to institutions in the United States of Oxyrhynchus and other Egypt Exploration Fund papyri during the period 1900 to 1922. - Avec résumé en anglais.
